MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Rosyth. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:07pm due to a damaged conductor on our overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40pm on Saturday, 12 December 2020
